long_description: Great for travel, the versatile, medium-size Fjallraven Rucksack No. 21 Daypack gives you a clean, classic look with real leather trim, a padded laptop sleeve and a removable seat pad. Heavy-duty polyester/cotton fabric is infused with Greenland Wax for eco-friendly wind and water resistance. Main compartment features a pocket with a padded bottom that can hold a laptop up to 15 in. Removable seat pad stows inside; internal pocket holds a thermos upright. Interior is light colored so it's easy to see the contents; snow lock cinches the top-loading main compartment. Leather lid straps attach to metal nubs on the front; lightly padded shoulder straps have leather straps with adjustable buckles. Fjallraven Rucksack No. 21 Daypack features a large front pocket and 2 open side pockets.
short_description: Great for travel, the versatile, medium-size Fjallraven Rucksack No. 21 Daypack gives you a clean, classic look with real leather trim, a padded laptop sleeve and a removable seat pad.
